ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Work Complete"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Billing Complete")), NOT(Office2__r.Name == 'Seattle'), NOT(Office2__r.Name == 'Denver'), NOT(Office2__r.Name == 'Florida'), NOT(Office2__r.Name == 'Corporate'), ISBLANK( Project_Manager_new__c ), DATEVALUE(Date_Time_Taken__c)>= DATE(2015,01,01), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Division__c , 'Marketing')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Division__c , 'Consulting')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Division__c , 'Catastrophes')), NOT( Estimate_Only__c ), NOT( Ladder_Assist__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the Project Manager field is populated before setting the Job to Complete. Project Manager cannot be same as Project Director.
